title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, objectives, target audience, and gather requirements from stakeholders.

title: Design Virtual Reality Environment
description: Create the overall design and architecture for the VR environment, including user interface, navigation, interactive elements, and data flow. Consider the following aspects: immersive 3D graphics, spatial audio, hand/gesture tracking, voice commands, and integration with mortgage calculation and recommendation engines.
dependencies: Define User Personas and Journey Maps

title: Develop Financial Education Content
description: Research and create educational content on mortgages, personal finance, and related topics to be integrated into the VR platform.

title: Design and Implement VR Mortgage Advisor
description: Develop the virtual mortgage advisor component, including personalized mortgage options, calculations, recommendations, and integration with external data sources for real-time mortgage rates and financial data.
dependencies: Integrate with External Financial Data APIs

title: Develop VR User Interface
description: Create the user interface for the VR platform, integrating the financial education content and mortgage advisor components.

title: Implement Data Storage and Management
description: Design and develop the database schema and data management system for storing user information, mortgage options, educational content, and application logs.

title: Develop Security and Privacy Measures
description: Implement comprehensive security and privacy measures to protect user data, including encryption, access controls, and data anonymization techniques. Ensure compliance with relevant regulations such as GDPR, CCPA, and industry standards like PCI-DSS. Develop policies and procedures for data handling, incident response, and regular security audits.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing strategies, including functional, usability, and performance testing for the VR platform.
dependencies: Design and Implement VR Mortgage Advisor

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment infrastructure, continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines, and monitoring for the VR platform.
